description: Dart source file defining themes for a Flutter application, including color palette, typography, and widget styling for light and dark modes.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A utility class providing color palettes, typography, and theme data configurations for a vintage-styled Flutter application.

methods.name: _colorScheme
methods.description: Generates a ColorScheme based on the specified brightness, defining colors for dark and light themes.

methods.name: _typography
methods.description: Creates a TextTheme with specific font styles and fallback fonts, used for consistent typography across themes.
